question.title: Why cannot find the declaration of element 'web-app' in eclipse and Downloading external resources is disabled?
question.body:
When I using Eclipse to build java web project, I find web.xml in my Tomcat configure and project meet the same question. There're 2 questions in the label of web-app. My original usage is as follows:

<web-app version="4.0" xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee                       https://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd\">

Firstly, the web-app label says cvc-elt.1.a: Cannot find the declaration of element 'web-app'.

Secondly, the link says Downloading external resources is disabled.

Pictures as follows show the error on web.xml in Tomcat configure, and the web.xml in the project has the same error.

Then, I find some methods to solve this problem, because I use Tomcat 9.0, so I find that it maybe because that they're working with new jakarta package. And then, I change this label to as follows:

<web-app xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee" xmlns:web="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee" xsi:schemaLocation="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee/web-app_5_0.xsd http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_2_5.xsd" id="WebApp_ID" version="5.0">

After that, a new error occurred on the link, it also says Downloading external resources is disabled. Should I change the web-app label to new model which using jakarta? And how to solve the problem that Downloading external resources is disabled.?

question_comments.body: Your original file was fine. Looks like an almost duplicate of stackoverflow.com/questions/77252112/… otherwise.
